sentences.english: Before, Shenyin Wanguo Research Institute that is a special report on the Margin analysis .
sentences.chinese: 在此之前，申银万国研究所是对利润分析的特别报告。

sentences.english: An earnest prayer for your country and other countries is well becoming in the mouth of every believer.
sentences.chinese: 信徒要为万国万民常常迫切代祷，本是圣经的教导。

sentences.english: Yes, let all kings go down before him; let all nations be his servants.
sentences.chinese: 诸王都要叩拜他，万国都要事奉他。

sentences.english: But I scattered them with a whirlwind among all the nations whom they knew not.
sentences.chinese: 我必以旋风吹散他们到素不认识的万国中。

sentences.english: She gave birth to a son, a male child, who will rule all the nations with an iron scepter.
sentences.chinese: 妇人生了一个男孩，是将来要用铁杖辖管万国的。

sentences.english: Today we are gathering here for the grand opening ceremony of the Universal Postal Congress.
sentences.chinese: 今天，万国邮政联盟大会将在这里隆重开幕7。

sentences.english: Who in times past suffered all nations to walk in their own ways.
sentences.chinese: 他在从前的世代，任凭万国各行其道。

sentences.english: God of nations at Thy feet.
Then will I make this house like Shiloh, and will make this city a curse to all the nations of the earth.
sentences.chinese: 我就必使这殿如示罗，使这城为地上万国所咒诅的。

sentences.english: And the gentiles shall come to Thy light.
In the Palais des Nations in Geneva , we held an activity called "A Journey of Art."
sentences.chinese: 在日内瓦联合国万国宫举办了“艺术之旅”文化活动。

sentences.english: The Big Green Chair: This blogger is the president of CFNI, the bible school which I attend.
sentences.chinese: 玆网志是由我就读的万国归主圣经学院院长所设计。

sentences.english: She is the first female rural postal worker to take the stage at a meeting of the UPU.
sentences.chinese: 她是第一个登上万国邮政联盟讲台的乡村女邮递员。

sentences.english: American leaders not only acknowledged the law of nations, but took its directions seriously.
sentences.chinese: 美国领导人们不但承认，而且认真遵循万国公法。

sentences.english: Who would not fear thee, O King of nations?
sentences.chinese: 万国的王阿，谁不敬畏你。

sentences.english: The Congress shall have Power to define and punish Offences against the Law of Nations.
sentences.chinese: 国会应有权力界定及惩罚违反万国公法。
